吵.definition: to quarrel; to make a noise; noisy; to disturb by making a noise

吵吵.definition: to make a racket; to quarrel

吵嚷.definition: to make a racket; clamour; uproar

吵架.definition: to quarrel; to have a row; quarrel; CL:頓|顿[dun4]

吵醒.definition: to wake sb up with a noise

吵鬧.definition: noisy; raucous; to shout and scream
